description: This file contains CSS styles for theming and layout of the application, including light and dark theme color variables.

classes.name: App
classes.description: The main application container with centered alignment and responsive styles.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with a flex layout, applying background and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styled link element that uses theme-dependent color and has hover transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button element for toggling themes, styled with padding, background, and hover effects.
